name: Treasure of Pirate
description:
On the perilous Grand Line, who is truly the strongest? All the classic battles from the original manga, plus new features like Arena and Raid! Each character has their very own special skills. Using them properly will earn you the winning advantage!



— Remember the every classic One Piece moment. The very town where Luffy met Shanks, that’s where our story begins. As the game develops following the plot, you are brought back to all the memorable scenes and dialogs, and let tears come out of your eyes.



— Choose your own crew. Who’s your favorite pirate? Which characters do you dream to have on your ship? Now, your dream will come true? Battles, recruitment, special events, there’re many ways to get your favorite OP characters, to build your dream pirate crew!



— Collab Attack! Mighty Combo Skills! Use each crewmate’s special combos to launch the classic joint strikes from the manga! Victory or defeat? It’s all in your hands!
